overview: The Zebra Club is an underground after-hours club where every fantasy comes to life.  Scene Breakdowns  Scene 1. Purple Passion, Robbie Dee  Scene 2. Barbara Dare, Buddy Love  Scene 3. Je T'Aime, Buddy Love  Scene 4. Tanya Foxx, Robbie Dee  Scene 5. Je T'Aime, Blake Palmer  Scene 6. Je T'Aime, Purple Passion, Tanya Foxx
title: The Zebra Club
